thread.section_title: Arsenal to play Bayern Munich in pre-season friendly in China – Metro
thread.title: Arsenal to play Bayern Munich in pre-season friendly in China
thread.title_full: Arsenal to play Bayern Munich in pre-season friendly in China

author: markbrus88
title: Arsenal to play Bayern Munich in pre-season friendly in China
text:
Bayern humiliated Arsenal in the Champions League just last week (Picture: Getty) Arsenal have announced that they’ll be playing Bayern Munich again in the next few months with a pre-season friendly in China announced for 19 July.
Arsenal fans have actually raised over £2000 for 'Wenger Out' campaign Gooners aren’t exactly delighted at the news, with their 10-2 aggregate defeat to the Bavarians in the Champions League still fresh on their minds…because it was a week ago.
The Gunners lost 5-1 both home and away to Bayern to be dumped out of Europe at the last 16 stage for the seventh season in a row, but what better way to put things right than with possible revenge in a summer friendly?
Arsenal players and fans must be dying to play Bayern again… (Picture: Getty) Will it be this one-sided again in Shanghai? (Picture: Getty) Arsenal and Bayern will play in Shanghai as part of their 2017 summer tour, and will also meet old foes Chelsea in Beijing on 22 July.
Showing himself to be in tune as ever with the club’s fans, Arsenal chief executive Ivan Gazidis said: ‘It will be very special for our Chinese fans to see a game of this stature.
More: Football Video: Jose Mourinho silences Chelsea fans with PERFECT response during Man Utd clash 
True Gooner! Arsenal new-boy aims dig at Chelsea after ditching Blues for Gunners 
Chelsea star speaks out over summer Real Madrid move 
‘We have a fantastic following in China and the two games we are playing there this summer will be an exciting part of our build up for the new season.’
Needless to say, fans’ reaction to this news was not as positive…
@ Arsenal Aren’t 10 goals enough? No need to be beaten by 20 goals more.
— 
Az (@iAzxz) March 14, 2017 @ Arsenal seriously why agree to get embarrassed again
— 
Stuart Boyd (@Stubo84) March 14, 2017 @ Arsenal Of all teams....your having us on? Bayern?
— 
Stephen Jewell (@bergiebigboy) March 14, 2017 @ Arsenal This is a wind up right??
— 
Mark (@WhiskyOneIce) March 14, 2017 Come on men, 
1. Bayern has humiliated Arsenal already.
2. We still remember 10-2
3.Why is Arsenal in International Champions cup? https://t.co/FJYebXZtTs 
— Chris-Leo Ngaruthi (@Ngaruthi) March 14, 2017 
So Arsenal aren't content with conceding 10 goals over two games in the champions league to Bayern now we will play them in pre-season 
— Berney Wright (@BerneyAFC) March 14, 2017 

MORE: Arsenal fans raise over £2000 in crowdfunder to force Arsene Wenger out
